item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Lyuxi Liu.

I hold a master’s degree from the University of Virginia.
My research interests lie at the intersection of Digital Humanities, Computational Social Science, and NLP / Machine Learning.

I’m interested in how theoretical concepts, social phenomena, and institutional structures can be modeled, measured, and explored through computational and data-driven approaches.

About this site

This site serves as a personal research space.

  • Projects document research-oriented prototypes, tools, and experimental systems
  • Essays collect unpublished analytical and theoretical writing, including exploratory ideas and ongoing work.

Most content here represents work in progress rather than finalized research output.
